name: Nuun, Electrolyte Drink Tabs Citrus Fruit, 8 Count, 1.8 Ounce
short_description: Nuun Hydration: Electrolyte Drink Tablets, enhanced with electrolytes and bursting with a natural, low calorie citrus fruity flavor, mix into a hydrating drink to keep up your energy and hydration no matter how active you get or how much you sweat.

Nuun Hydration's Electrolyte Drink Tablets enhance your workout or your work day naturally through improved hydration. Keep a tube from this multi-pack in your gym bag, car, purse, hiking pack or anywhere you'll want to mix up a healthy, replenishing drink

Great for working out, hiking, cycling, exercise, sports or daily use to improve and replenish your energy and endurance and prevent cramps, whether running a marathon or running errands. Nuun's Drink Tablets use no artificial flavoring or sweeteners.

Add 1 of the 10 tablets in each tube to your water bottle so your body gets more from the water you're drinking. Our commitment to a clean product, clean planet, and clean sports means your performance comes from good hydration and hard work.
product_description: Elevate your hydration with Nuun Sport Electrolyte Tablets, the perfect electrolyte drink mix featuring a clean formula* that delivers optimal electrolyte replenishment in a convenient, dissolvable tablet. Designed for athletes, fitness enthusiasts, and active individuals seeking effective hydration support, these electrolyte tablets provide essential electrolyte balance with clean ingredients.* Each serving of Nuun hydration tablets contains five key electrolytes (Sodium 300mg, Potassium 150mg, Magnesium 25mg, Calcium 13mg, and Chloride 40mg) and are backed by science*** to support proper hydration and muscle function. Our tablets are sweetened with stevia leaf extract and contain 1g of sugar per serving, making them perfect for various dietary preferences including kosher, vegan, and gluten-free lifestyles. Simply drop one tablet into 16 fl oz of water, let it fizz and dissolve, then enjoy a refreshing electrolyte drink that helps you maintain optimal hydration levels. Each tube is perfectly portable for your active lifestyle, whether you're hitting the gym, hiking trails, or powering through your workday. With over a decade of experience in hydration science, Nuun remains committed to providing clean*, effective hydration drink mixes you can trust.** *Clean is defined as non-GMO, vegan, and gluten free. **These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. ***Electrolyte levels based on the ratio of Sodium, Chloride, Potassium in our products. See Nuun's website for more details.

(1) Each effervescent tablet contains 200 mg Sodium, 125 mg Potassium, 75 mg Chloride, 30 mg Calcium and 20 mg Magnesium to add hydrating power to your water. Designed for low- and no-sweat occasions, these delicious, fruit-flavored electrolyte tablets are a great choice for staying hydrated on busy days and during gentler movement like walking and yoga. Like all Nuun Hydration products, Zero Sugar is gluten-free, vegan and made with clean ingredients. Simply add one tablet to 16 fl oz of water, dissolve and enjoy. Replenish what your body loses naturally to help maintain energy levels, support cognitive function, and promote overall vitality
Enhanced with Vitamins B6 & B12: Includes Vitamin B6 and Vitamin B12 to support energy metabolism and overall vitality, complementing your hydration needs

Experience the convenience of just one easy-to-take vegan capsule daily, providing 120 servings per bottle. Our clean, trusted formula features Non-GMO, gluten-free vegan capsules free from soy and dairy, proudly made in the USA at a GMP-certified facility and rigorously third-party tested for purity, potency, and safety.
